name: Dicy Plants
description:
Dicy Plants is a game of chance, deduction and resource management in which you make potions to modify the harvest of your dice plant.

The game was created in 48h for the GMTK 2022 game jam. The theme was “Roll of the Dice“.

  1. Mix any two different ingredients together to make a potion - 
  2. Collect potions ready for the growth phase
  3. While your dice plant is growing, add potions to modify the net of the dice that will be created
  4. When the plant blooms, roll the dice to harvest new ingredients
  5. Keep note of what you mix and make - once you know enough, you can work out what to mix to make what you need.

Credits:

  • Folcon and Propidium debated the game design
  • Folcon did the programming.
  • Propidium did the art.

Hope you enjoy it!
